attributes.review: This app is very confusing for anyone in my family to navigate and utilize. I was expecting something incredible but instead i left and deleted it with disappointment. I do not want anyone to go through what my family and i went through so i strongly encourage for this app to sadly be removed. Thank you.
attributes.title: disappointed

attributes.review: i got this app to learn more about trump because i kept getting texts after i signed up for the NH rally (which unfortunately i won’t be able to attend because i have to walk my cat.) anyways, i was very disappointed in the app. it has no ✨flavor✨. there should be a spot where i can speak to my fellow orange supporters. do better 🌈
attributes.title: very disappointed 💫🤧

attributes.review: I am a brainwashed, idiotic, lacking human empathy Trump supporter. I truly believe that our wonderful president with his gorgeous spray tan deserves much better than this terrible app. I was so excited to download the app and support what we Trump supporters act like is our god, but the app kept shutting down my phone and crashing. President Trump would never approve something as terrible as this. 🇺🇸Trump 2020🇺🇸
attributes.title: Disappointed

attributes.review: I’d give it 0 stars if I could. I got this app to educate myself and only found awful adds and disgusting views. I thought the left was lying about trumps views to make him sound bad, but he truly is an awful man who only thinks of himself! The app looked disgusting and gave me stupid adds for mercy that I didn’t want every 5 seconds.
attributes.title: Format and disgusting and the content is worse

attributes.review: I brought my child to this restaurant and he ordered Mac and cheese. Then the waitress threw my son across the room screaming trump 2020 🙀✨✨✨✨✨❄️❄️and then I downloaded the app. This app had naked people all over the home screen. I feel violated that this app exists. My son was on my phone and opened the app. HE SAW ALL THE NAKED PEOPLE. I just feel attacked because of my self esteem but it was right to the meet of my friends. 🌬🌬✨✨✨✨
attributes.title: BAnAnA 🍌

attributes.review:
I downloaded this app excited to see what it held. I was incredibly disappointed by the formatting and how SLOW it is. I can barely navigate a single thing! You would think our president would give us something special and worth while. This is the complete opposite. My mind is numbing at the fact I even downloaded this dumb app >:(

NOT HAPPY!!
attributes.title: Horrible!

attributes.review: SoI just wanted to see what President 🍊orange 🍊 had planned for the future....AndWow, I only had the app for less than andAlready got annoyed with, while looking through the appStuff started happening like voices telling me how he’s a ✨sexist ✨person a 💅🏼predator💅🏼 and also 🌈rasict 🌈and it also just blew up my phone way to much😒....So I do not recommend if you don’t want similar experiences🥱
attributes.title: 🤢HORRIBLE APP 🤮

attributes.review: This app was awfully designed. There’s no sensible flow to any of it. Not to mention it eats up your phones battery. And shuts down for no apparent reason. It also asks for way too much personal information, and doesn’t give details to his rallies. Plus there’s a whole thing for Latinos for trump? Heck no, get them out of here. This is an app for the superiors.
attributes.title: No stars if I could

attributes.review: This app almost killed me. I was driving and using the gps and the app open up by itself and didn’t allow me to take my turn on time. The app made my google map app crash and due to that I took the wrong turn and crashed my car with my pregnant cat inside and made it go into labor. -7/10 wouldn’t recommend
attributes.title: 🧚‍♀️this app ain’t it ✨

attributes.review: Hello my friends this is a trash app by a trash man who deserves to live in a dumpster or hopefully 💫 jail💫. Since trumpy is trying to take away our app, tik tok, we will take away his app, whatever this trash is. Please if you see this and can vote, go vote to get this orange Cheeto puff man trash blob nugget out of office before he does anymore damage to this already horrible country. Thank you for coming to my ted talk.
attributes.title: No ❤️
